context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: explore options like setting up a crowdfunding campaign or seeking help from non-profit organizations that help cover healthcare costs

seek financial assistance from friends, family, or charitable organizations
apply for pharmaceutical company patient assistance programs
seek assistance from charitable organizations or medical foundations that help patients in need
try reaching out to charities, nonprofits, or patient assistance programs that may be able to help lower or cover the cost of the medication
seek financial assistance
seek financial aid or assistance from various sources such as government healthcare programs, local charities, or crowd-sourcing through online platforms like GoFundMe
start a crowdfunding campaign online
seek financial assistance from different sources

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-hailing service to pick him up and get him to the airport

call for a taxi, Uber or another ride-sharing service to take him to the airport
call a taxi, Uber, or other rideshare service to pick him up and take him to the airport

call a taxi, Uber, or another rideshare service to quickly and safely get him to the airport

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad could do is to
generation: create a signal fire to attract the attention of nearby search and rescue teams
start a fire for warmth and signal for help
prioritize their survival needs and establish a signal for potential rescuers
gather his group and discuss the situation, ensure everybody is staying calm and collected
build a temporary shelter using the resources around them to retain warmth, especially during the night
start a signal fire to attract the attention of any passing airplanes or rescue crews
start a fire
find a sheltered area where they can stay warm and build a fire
start rationing the remaining food and water while trying to find a way to make a signal for help
build a fire for warmth and use the snow to melt for drinking water
